title: 12 Pack Cheesecloth Table Runner, 10ft Rustic Sheer Runner Gauze Tablecloth Boho Wedding Decor Romantic Table Runner for Wedding Bridal Shower Birthday Party(35" x 118") (Terracotta)
descriptions:
Introducing the 12 Pack Cheesecloth Table Runner, a must-have for any event! This 10ft Rustic Sheer Runner Gauze Tablecloth is perfect for adding a touch of elegance and romance to your wedding, bridal shower, birthday party, or any special occasion. 

Made from high-quality polyester, this table runner is not only soft to the touch but also durable, ensuring that it will last for many events to come. Its lightweight and skin-friendly nature make it comfortable to use, while its terracotta color adds a rustic and boho vibe to your decor. 

The 35" x 118" dimensions of this table runner make it suitable for most tables, allowing you to easily create a stunning tablescape. With 12 pieces included in each pack, you'll have plenty of table runners to decorate your entire venue. 

But that's not all! This versatile table runner can also be used as chair cover sashes, decorative napkins, or even for gift wrapping. Its applications are endless! 

Cleaning and maintaining this table runner is a breeze. Simply hand wash or machine wash it using cold water and mild detergent on a gentle cycle. Avoid using hot water and do not iron. 

We are dedicated to providing excellent customer support, so please feel free to reach out to us with any questions or concerns. 

Don't miss out on this 12 Pack Cheesecloth Table Runner and elevate your event decor to the next level!
